collection.openText: “Evenone has a place they want to return to, right?”

observe.desc: [ {Consulation Record X-XX-52 Counselor: Hello Galia, how was today? Galia: Like always, I just want to get home and take a break. Counselor: Got yourself a significant other? Galia: I guess you could call my television a sigificant other. I have an entire drama to catch up on, you see. Counselor: (Chuckles) I'm sorry for taking your time. Nothing more on your mind? Galia: A bit worried about being fired, I guess. I found a good listener here Counselor: Could you tell me who that is? Galia: I will, once I catch up on all these drama episodes.} ]

[ {Consulation Record X-XX-54 Counselor: I heard of the news. Are you alright, Galia? Can you talk about it? Galia: …I want to go home. Counselor: I understand. Many people die here. It's normal to feel that way. Galia: I...I killed someone. He, him...he tried to... Counselor: That was self-defense, Galia. Think rationally. It wasn't your fault. Galia: ...I want to go home. Counselor: I'll give you some tranquilizers along with your sleeping pills. Rest up for the next few days, and take care of yourself. Feel free to visit whenever you need me.} ]
